data.title: Georgia state football records
data.text:
This is the records wiki page. Click here to return to main records page.

Updating records

Updating records are easy and anyone with an account can do it! Just follow these simple steps!

The GHSFHA "State Records Project" is an attempt to research and publish reported state records in Georgia high school football. Because official statistics are not required or maintained by any state organization, the records that we display here come from individual schools and from media reports, primarily newspapers. Statistics provided by school officials (ie, coaches, statisticians) take precedence. We cannot guarantee the accuracy or completeness of these records nor have we made great efforts to validate any of the information provided in this section.
